job.title: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Engineer
job.description: pUS Tech Solutions is seeking an Google Cloud Platform GCP Engineer for a 6 months contract to hire position with a client in Dallas TXppbrppJob Poster Sheraz Durrani  SherazustechsolutionsinccomppbrppTitle Google Cloud Platform GCP EngineerppWork Location Dallas TX 100 RemoteppDuration 6 Months Contract to HireppCOVID PROTOCOL Must be fully vaccinatedppbrppDescriptionpp Were looking for an innovative Google Cloud Platform GCP Engineer who is passionate and enthusiastic about leveraging GCP in all aspectspp Your experience is needed to help us scale out our use of GCP for a client that truly understands and supports the value of Google technologiespp You will own the environment and with your vision help architect build and deploy for enterprise scale various applications in support of our work with the clientppbrppJob Responsibilitiespp 24 years of GCP experience as a data engineer and cloud architect includingpp Understanding how to configure access and security as needed Cloud Identity amp Access Managementpp Development of machine templates and blueprints with GCPpp Leveraging multiple GCP services related to data management storage workflows and scalability eg BigQuery PubSub Dataflow Cloud Storage etcpp Proficiency in SQL Skills ie DML and DDLpp Strong understanding of relational database management systems RDBMS concepts including primaryforeign keys indexing data types referential integrity ERD etcpp Familiarity with multiple GCP APIs Cloud Storage Vision Logging Monitoring Stackdriver Google App Engine DLP NLP Cloud Taskspp Experience with IOT datapp Minimum 2 certifications in GCPpp Working knowledge or experience with Java HTML andor JQuery is a pluspp Experience with web mapping tools and spatial databases is a plusppbrppWork experiencepp 2 to 4 years of experienceppbrppEducationpp Bachelors degree BABS in a related field such as information systems mathematicsppbrppAbout US Tech SolutionsppYour talent our opportunities  This is the premise behind US Tech SolutionsppYou have the skill we have the opportunity As a team we work passionately for you to get the right career opportunity across industry verticals and functions For past sixteen years leading GlobalppCompanies and Fortune 500 come to us to get the right talent Whether you want to work as fulltime contractor or parttime technical or nontechnical our talent consultants will connect with the right career opportunity globallyppConnect with our talent team todayppUSTECH was founded in 2000 by Manoj Agarwal Today we are a global firm offering talent solutions to 150 customers including 20 of Fortune 500 across Financial Services Healthcare Life Sciences Aerospace Energy Retail Telecom Technology Manufacturing and Engineering We are headquartered in New Jersey with 40 global locations across the USA Canada Europe and India Deloitte has recognized USTECH as one of the fastest growing private businesses for the past five consecutive years and INC 500 for the past three We have also been rated The Top Business in the US by Diversity Business since 2011 To learn more about how US Tech Solutions visit our website wwwustechsolutionscomppUS Tech Solutions Inc is an Affirmative Action Equal Opportunity Employer Our employment decisions are made without regard to race color religion gender national origin age disability marital status veteran or military status or any other legally protected statusp
